title: Customer Churn Risk Modeling
summary: Built a churn risk model and dashboard to prioritize retention outreach.
caseStudyData: Combined 24 months of CRM activity, subscription transactions, and support logs; standardized IDs and imputed sparse engagement fields before modeling.
caseStudyMethods: Trained gradient-boosted trees with recency-frequency features, compared against logistic regression baseline, and tuned thresholding for retention team capacity.
caseStudyResults: Improved top-decile churn capture by 31 percent over baseline and reduced wasted outreach by focusing account-manager effort on high-risk cohorts.
caseStudyReproducibility: Repository includes pinned dependencies, SQL feature extraction scripts, and notebook-to-pipeline parity checks for repeatable training runs.
caseStudyReflection: Next iteration should add causal uplift testing to separate true intervention impact from naturally reactivating customers.

title: Retail Sales Forecasting Dashboard
summary: Built an executive dashboard with rolling forecasts and anomaly alerts for weekly revenue planning.
caseStudyData: Aggregated store-level daily sales, promotions, and holiday calendars across 180 locations, then corrected late-arriving records with a weekly reconciliation job.
caseStudyMethods: Benchmarked Prophet against seasonal naive and gradient boosting regressors, then shipped the best-performing ensemble with confidence interval monitoring.
caseStudyResults: Lowered weekly MAPE from 14.8 percent to 9.6 percent and gave finance partners two extra planning days through automated refresh workflows.
caseStudyReproducibility: Repo documents data contracts, environment setup, and one-command pipeline execution to rebuild forecasts and dashboard extracts from raw tables.
caseStudyReflection: Future work should incorporate price elasticity features and scenario simulation for promotion-heavy periods.

title: Support Ticket NLP Triage
summary: Automated support ticket categorization and urgency scoring to speed up SLA routing.
caseStudyData: Built a labeled corpus from historical support tickets, policy metadata, and escalation outcomes, with PII redaction and language normalization pre-processing.
caseStudyMethods: Fine-tuned a transformer classifier for intent and urgency, calibrated probabilities, and added rule-based safeguards for critical keywords.
caseStudyResults: Increased first-pass routing accuracy to 87 percent and cut median triage time from 22 minutes to under 6 minutes for inbound queues.
caseStudyReproducibility: Project ships containerized inference service, model version manifests, and evaluation scripts for deterministic benchmark reruns.
caseStudyReflection: A stronger active-learning loop with agent feedback would improve long-tail categories and reduce annotation drift.
